snippet: LAURO--Dr. Louis, Beloved husband of Shirley, cherished father to Linda, Nancy, Andrea; grandfather to Marko, Lucy, Luke, Joshua, passed away peacefully at home, April 27. Services: Tuesday, May 3, 11:30am, Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Ave. (91st St.) 1/3
lead_paragraph: LAURO--Dr. Louis, Beloved husband of Shirley, cherished father to Linda, Nancy, Andrea; grandfather to Marko, Lucy, Luke, Joshua, passed away peacefully at home, April 27. Services: Tuesday, May 3, 11:30am, Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Ave. (91st St.) 1/3
